oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthetic studies on taxanes: a domino-enyne metathesis/Diels-Alder approach to the AB-ring
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KALIAPPAN, KP
RAVIKUMAR, V
PUJARI, SA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: enantioselective total-synthesis
natural-product syntheses
1st total-synthesis
c-ring
organic-synthesis
alpha,beta-unsaturated esters
stereocontrolled synthesis
carbonyl-compounds
tandem reactions
model system
taxol
rcm
grubbs catalyst
imda
anticancer
domino reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A domino enyne cross-metathesis/intramolecular Diels-Alder reaction has been successfully used to synthesize a bicyclo[5.3.1] undecene, corresponding to AB-ring of taxol without the gem dimethyl group.
